meanings.definition: The state of not fulfilling something.
meanings.sent1: The nonfulfillments of his promises disappointed everyone.
meanings.sent2: She felt frustrated by the nonfulfillments of her dreams.
meanings.sent3: The nonfulfillments of the cake order left the party guests hungry.
meanings.sent4: The nonfulfillments in their relationship created a rift between them.
meanings.sent5: The nonfulfillments in his work ethic were evident to all his colleagues.

meanings.sent1: The nonfulfillments in the contract led to legal issues.
meanings.sent2: They discussed the nonfulfillments of the project during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The nonfulfillments of the homework assignment made the teacher raise an eyebrow.
meanings.sent4: The nonfulfillments in their agreement caused a lot of misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The nonfulfillments of the delivery caused inconvenience to the customer.
